alert.note: Alert for Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:54AM CDT until September 25 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Sutton County in west central Texas... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864, or 12 miles east of Sonora, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Sutton County, including the following locations... The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 407 and 432. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
